content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am aware that you are a student and you are looking for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Considering the location and the facilities, I believe 800 euros per month is a fair price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you proposed is too low. I am looking for a higher price considering the prime location and facilities of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Understood. Let's say 950 euros per month, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. It is in the city center, after all.
[Question]
[Your answer]
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and its location in the city center, I am willing to pay 900 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand. How about 925 euros per month, which is a fair price considering the location and facilities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding. I agree to the price of 920 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany
